title: RHONY Recap - A Cringe Charity & A Countess Halloween
itunes:title: RHONY Recap - A Cringe Charity & A Countess Halloween
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of New York, which featured one of the most appalling/compelling scenes in Housewives history, as well as a Halloween performance from Lu, Dale making a stocking, and lots more. Lu's social media manag...
description:
Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of New York, which featured one of the most appalling/compelling scenes in Housewives history, as well as a Halloween performance from Lu, Dale making a stocking, and lots more. Lu's social media manager, Jamin, also pops by to talk about working with Housewives.


*To support this pod & access bonus eps, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
